# <a name="change-the-look-of-your-outlook-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="355f5-102">變更 Outlook 信箱的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-102">Change the look of your Outlook mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="355f5-103">您可以變更郵寄清單和讀取窗格的外觀，使它看起來和行為您想要的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-103">You can change the appearance of the message list and reading pane so it looks and behaves the way you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="355f5-104">選擇您的郵件應該個別顯示或交談，如果新郵件應該出現在郵寄清單的頂端或底端，等等。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-104">Choose whether your messages should be displayed individually or as conversations, if new messages should appear at the top or bottom of the message list, and more.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="355f5-105">選取齒輪圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-105">Select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="355f5-106">在頁面頂端，開啟 [設定] 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-106">at the top of the page to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="355f5-107">選擇 [焦點收件匣]、[顯示密度]、[交談模式] 及 [讀取窗格] 的設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-107">Choose your settings for Focused Inbox, display density, conversation view, and reading pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="355f5-108">在郵寄清單的頂端，選取 [**篩選** > **排序依據**]，以選擇要如何排序電子郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-108">At the top of the message list, select **Filter** > **Sort by** to choose how you want to sort your email.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="355f5-109">若要深入瞭解，請參閱[變更信箱的外觀](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="355f5-109">To learn more, see [Change the look of your mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c).</span></span>
